output.temperature: python -c 'import pandas;import glob;import json;print(json.dumps({f.split("_evolution.csv")[0]:pandas.read_csv(f).to_dict() for f in glob.glob("temperature_evolution.csv")}))'
output.pressure: python -c 'import pandas;import glob;import json;print(json.dumps({f.split("_evolution.csv")[0]:pandas.read_csv(f).to_dict() for f in glob.glob("pressure_evolution.csv")}))'
output.flow: python -c 'import pandas;import glob;import json;print(json.dumps({f.split("_evolution.csv")[0]:pandas.read_csv(f).to_dict() for f in glob.glob("flow_evolution.csv")}))'
